ComicInfo.Summary:
Belladonna and her shield maidens craft a clever ruse, but it all quickly dissolves into bloodshed and carnage! Series artist Nahuel Lopez delivers his most luscious women and vicious battles ever!
Available with these sexy covers: Regular (and Nude), Viking Vixen (and Nude) by Lopez - Shield Maiden (and Nude) by Matt Martin - Stunning (and Nude)and Killer Body (and Nude) by Renato Camilo - Wraparound (and Nude) by Raulo Caceres - a special set of six Glorious covers by Christian Zanier and a set of three Playtime Adult covers by Christian Zanier - and a 50 Shades Nude by Camilo that is limited to just 50 copies!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Nahuel Lopez | 1 | Wrap | Wraparound Cover | Raulo Caceres | 2 | GC | Glorious Cover | Christian Zanier | 3 | SC | Stunning Cover | Renato Camilo | 4 | SMC | Shield Maiden Cover | Matt Martin | 5 | SNC | Stunning Nude Cover | Renato Camilo | 6 | KBNC | Killer Body Nude Cover | Renato Camilo | 7 | GNC | Glorious Nude Cover | Christian Zanier | 8 | PAC | Playtime Adult Cover | Christian Zanier | 9 | GSC | Glorious Skimpy Cover | Christian Zanier | 10 | FSNC | Fifty Shades Nude Cover, Limited to 50 | Renato Camilo | 11 | VVC | Viking Vixen Cover | Nahuel Lopez | 12 | KBC | Killer Body Cover | Renato Camilo | 13 | GTC | Glorious Topless Cover | Christian Zanier | 14 | GAC | Glorious Adult Cover | Christian Zanier | 15 | SMNC | Shield Maiden Nude Cover | Matt Martin | 16 | PNC | Playtime Nude Cover | Christian Zanier | 17 | VVNC | Viking Vixen Nude Cover | Nahuel Lopez | 18 | GAEC | Glorious Adult Extreme Cover | Christian Zanier | 19 | WNC | Wraparound Nude Cover | Raulo Caceres | 20 | PAEC | Playtime Adult Extreme Cover | Christian Zanier | 21 | NC | Nude Cover | Nahuel Lopez | 22 |
